original_text: Can a bird fall in a snare upon the earth, where no gin is for him? shall one take up a snare from the earth, and have taken nothing at all?
korean_text: 덫을 땅에 놓지 않았는데 새가 어찌 거기 치이겠으며 잡힌 것이 없는데 덫이 어찌 땅에서 튀겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Can a bird fall in a snare upon the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 새가 땅 위의 올무에 빠질 수 있겠는가

sentences.original_text: where no gin is for him?
shall one take up a snare from the earth
and have taken nothing at all?
